text: Vasily Kuzmich Bochkaryov (; 29 April 1949 - 22 June 2016) was a Russian politician. He served as Head of Zheleznodorozhny District of Penza from 1987 to 1998. He was elected Head of the Administration of Penza Oblast in April 1998. He became Governor of Penza Oblast in June 1998. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Russian politicians Category:People from Penza Oblast
title: Vasily Bochkaryov
